message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC

The paper deals with the problem of estimating entropy rates of Markov chains, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves analyzing the sample complexity of the estimation problem, which is a topic related to data structures (cs.DS) and statistical learning (cs.SI). Finally, the paper applies the estimation methods to language modeling, which is a topic related to computational linguistics (cs.CL).
